member.name: T:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address
member.summary:
Representa una dirección.
CAUTION!! El origen de datos (ilion) tiene un diseño sensible a incoherencia de datos en lo que respecta a ciudad, provincia y país para este ente. Este modelo necesita soportar y soporta la información introducida en el origen de datos pero a la vez también está sujeto a incoherencia de datos respecto a las propiedades informadas en este ente y la que tengan los correspondientes entes ciudad, provincia y país

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.Id
member.summary: Identificador

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.Street
member.summary: Calle, pudiendo incluir el número, piso, letra... (Ej: C/ Juan de la Cierva, 12 pido 5ª A)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.CityId
member.summary: [Opcional] Identificador de la ciudad/población. Null si no existe.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.CityName
member.summary:
[Opcional] Nombre de la ciudad/población. Null si no existe.
CAUTION!! Por diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede existir el nombre y no el id de ciudad correspondiente, así como haber en este modelo una correspondencia Id/Nombre de ciudad distinta a la que haya en el ente ciudad

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.PostalCode
member.summary:
[Opcional] Código postal. Null si no existe.
CAUTION!! Por diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede existir un código postal y no el nombre y/o id de ciudad correspondiente, así como haber en este modelo una correspondencia Id/Nombre/CP de ciudad distinta a la que haya en el ente ciudad

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.ProvinceId
member.summary:
[Opcional] Identificador de la provincia/región. Null si no existe
CAUTION!! Por diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede ser un Id que no se corresponda con el que tenga el ente ciudad que corresponda a la informada en este modelo

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.ProvinceName
member.summary:
[Opcional] Nombre de la provincia/región. Null si no existe
CAUTION!! Por el diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede existir el nombre y no el id de provincia correspondiente, así como haber en este modelo una correspondencia Id/Nombre de provincia distinta a la que haya en el ente provincia o a la que se llegue a través del ente ciudad que corresponda al informado en este modelo.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.CountryId
member.summary:
[Opcional] Identificador del país. Null si no existe
CAUTION!! Por el diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede ser un Id que no se corresponda con el que tenga el ente provincia que corresponda a la informada en este modelo.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.CountryName
member.summary:
[Opcional] Nombre del país. Null si no existe
CAUTION!! Por el diseño del origen de datos (ilion), puede existir el nombre y no el id de país correspondiente, así com ohaber en este modelo una correspondencia Id/Nombre de país distinta a la que haya en el ente país o a la que se llegue a través del ente provincia que corresponda al informado en este modelo

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.PhoneNumber
member.summary: [Opcional] Número de teléfono. Null si no existe

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.Type
member.summary: Tipo de dirección

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Address.OwnerEntityId
member.summary: Identificador de la entidad a la que pertenece esta dirección. El tipo de entidad vendrá determinada por la propiedad Type, si es que es conocida. (Ej: OwnerEntityId=0276322 y Type=CustomerMain significa el domicilio principal para el cliente con id 0276322)

member.name: F:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.AddressType.Other
member.summary: Otro (sin tipo específico)

member.name: F:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.AddressType.CustomerMain
member.summary: Domicilio principal de un cliente

member.name: T:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer
member.summary: This class contains a received customer information response message

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.Id
member.summary: Identificador (NCompany + Code)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.RateId
member.summary: Identificador (NCompany + Code) Nulo si no existe

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.TIN
member.summary: Número de identificación fiscal. Null si no está especificado. (Ej: 22123456Z en el caso de un NIF).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.TINTypeId
member.summary: [Opcional] Identificador (NComapny + Code) del tipo de número de identificación fiscal. Null si no está especificado. (Ej: 027636 podría ser el identificador de tipo de TIN que indicase que es un RUC)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.BusinessName
member.summary: [Opcional] Razon Social. Null si no existe

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.AddressList
member.summary: Lista de direcciones. Vacía si no existen

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.PhoneNumber
member.summary: [Opcional] Número de teléfono. Null si no existe

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.IsDischarged
member.summary: ¿Está dado de baja actualmente?

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.CustomerMessage
member.summary: [Opcional] Mensaje asociado al cliente

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.CustomerType
member.summary: Nulo si no hay TIPO_CLIENTE

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.Customer.CardInformation
member.summary: [Opcional] Información de cliente obtenida mediante lectura de tarjeta

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.Plate
member.summary: Matrícula. Formato: an-10

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.Balance
member.summary: Saldo disponible. Formato: n-8

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.BalanceCurrencyId
member.summary: Divisa (código según ISO8583). Formato: an-10

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.DrivenDistance
member.summary: KMs del vehículo. Formato: n-8

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.DriverName
member.summary: Nombre del conductor. Formato: an 0...50

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.ContactId
member.summary: Número de contacto de cliente. Formato an-10

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.DocumentTypeId
member.summary: Documento/Serie. Formato: an-4

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerCardInformation.IsFleet
member.summary: [Opcional] Indica si es un cliente de flota

member.name: T:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerInformationResponseEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains the EventArgs for exposing a received customer information response message (SetCustomerInput).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerInformationResponseEventArgs.Customer
member.summary: Main customer information

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerInformationResponseEventArgs.RestrictedProductReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets the restricted (unavailable) product references.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerInformationResponseEventArgs.RestrictedProductCategories
member.summary: Gets or sets the restricted (unavailable) product categories.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.CustomerInformationResponseEventArgs.PAN
member.summary: Card Number (PAN)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.GetCopyAsyncRequest.OriginTransactionId
member.summary: Origin transaction id. Identifies the transaction to be refunded.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.GetTransactionDetailsAsyncRequest.OriginTransactionId
member.summary: Origin trasnaction id. Identifies the newest transaction to be detailed (up to X (tipically 10) transactions will be detailed and this is the latest one). Should be a valid intermediary Operation Code received when MdP sent us a positive SaleAsyncResponse message (which is notified within a SaleResponseDataReceived or a RefundResponseDataReceived event) null or string.Empty are accepted when OriginTrasnactionDateTime is null. If OriginTransactionDateTime has value, this property should also be provided If NO OriginTransactionId nor OriginTransactionDateTime are provided, the last X transactions will be returned.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.GetTransactionDetailsAsyncRequest.OriginTransactionDateTime
member.summary: DateTime (detailed up to seconds). Identifies the datetime of the oldest transaction to be detailed (up to X (tipically 10) transactions will be detailed and this is the first one). null is accepted when OriginTransactionId is empty. If OriginTransactionId has value, this should be empty If NO OriginTransactionId nor OriginTransactionDateTime are provided, the last X transactions will be returned.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.InitializeTerminalCommunicationsRequest.Identity
member.summary: POS Identity

member.summary: This class contains the EventArgs for exposing a received message

member.summary: Message

member.name: T:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains the EventArgs for exposing a received monetary summary information response message (ClosureAsync / GetOperativeTotalsAsync / GetAuthorizationDetailsAsync / GetCopyAsync).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs.OriginSTANCode
member.summary: Referred STAN code. The code which was generated on origin request

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response Code related to the referred transaction. Value 0000 for SUCCESS

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs.IntermediaryOperationCode
member.summary: Intermediary Operation Code. Identifies the executed transaction into intermediary systems (i.e. redsys).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs.TextToShow
member.summary: Text for the caller app (to be shown on TPV screen)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryInformationResponseEventArgs.TextToPrint
member.summary: Text for the final customer (to be printed)

member.name: T:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs
member.summary: This class contains the EventArgs for exposing a received monetary transaction response message (SaleAsync / RefundAsync / PaymentManagement).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.OriginSTANCode
member.summary: Referred STAN code. The code which was generated on origin request

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response Code related to the referred transaction. Value 0000 for SUCCESS

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.PAN
member.summary: Card PAN OR masked Card Number.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.ApprovalCode
member.summary: Approval Code. Identifies the executed transaction.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.IntermediaryOperationCode
member.summary: Intermediary Operation Code. Identifies the executed transaction into intermediary entity systems (i.e. redsys).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.TextToShow
member.summary: Text for the caller app (to be shown on caller (TPV) screen)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.TextToPrint
member.summary: Text for the final customer (to be printed by caller (TPV))

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.MonetaryTransactionResponseEventArgs.TerminalSerialNumber
member.summary: Reported terminal serial number (value is injected from configuration parameter defined at Initialization)

member.summary: Amount to be paid

member.summary: Payment Mode code to be applied on the requested transaction.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.RefundAsyncRequest.Amount
member.summary: Amount to be paid

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.RefundAsyncRequest.OriginTransactionId
member.summary: Origin transaction id. Identifies the transaction to be refunded. Should be the same received when MdP sent us a positive SaleAsyncResponse message (which is notified within a SaleResponseDataReceived event)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.SaleAsyncRequest.Amount
member.summary: Amount to be paid

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.SaleAsyncRequest.IsSplitPayment
member.summary: Tells if the requested payment is a partial or full payment for the referred Document. Example: True for a document with total amount 10€, which is paid with cash and bank card (5€ + 5€, for example). Example: True for a document which is partially paid (document total 10€, but paid 7€ with bank card).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.SignalRHub.PaymentTerminal.SaleAsyncRequest.DocumentLines
member.summary: Document Lines within the related document

member.summary: Desired customer request state
